judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Decree affirmed, each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Perrin O. Hamilton, with him Robert O. Howrigan, for appellant.
S. Keene Mitchell, Jr., with him Bedford, Waller, Griffith, Darling & Mitchell, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Wood Estate.
Argued November 18, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
Perrin O. Hamilton, with him Robert O. Howrigan, for appellant.
S. Keene Mitchell, Jr., with him Bedford, Waller, Griffith, Darling & Mitchell, for appellee.
September 26, 1967:
